text: on Friday night you stole away the life

I do not know who you are

souls if the god for whom you killed so

in my wife's body

therefore I will not give you the gift

you lost same player same game I saw it
this morning
finally after nights and days of waiting
she was just as beautiful that she was

of course I'm devastated with grief I
